CustomField.formula: IF ( INCLUDES ( Account.Category__c , "Christian Colleges & Universities" ), "Christian Colleges & Universities; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Account.Category__c , "Historical Black Colleges & Universities" ), "Historical Black Colleges & Universities; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Account.Category__c , "Law School" ), "Law School; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Account.Category__c , "Medical School" ), "Medical School; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Account.Category__c , "Corporate Account" ), "Corporate Account; ",null )
CustomField.label: Category
